summary: In Greek mythology, Medusa was a famous monster called a Gorgon. She had snakes for hair, and her gaze could turn people into stone. Medusa was different from her sisters because she was mortal (could die). The hero Perseus killed her by cutting off her head. He used her head as a powerful weapon. Later, the goddess Athena placed Medusa's head on her shield. Medusa's story is ancient and has been told for thousands of years.
title: Medusa
